description: This file contains utility functions related to function invocation, argument parsing, and result caching within a larger Python project. It defines functions for creating function call objects from string arguments, handling JSON and literal evaluation, and a decorator factory for caching function results on the filesystem.

methods.name: get_function_call
methods.description: Constructs a FunctionCall object based on the provided function name, arguments, and call ID, with error handling for argument parsing.

methods.name: cache_result
methods.description: A decorator factory that creates a filesystem-based cache for function results, with configurable cache directory and TTL.
